name: GAD-7 (Generalized Anxiety Disorder-7) 量表
description: GAD-7（Generalized Anxiety Disorder-7）心理状况筛查量表是一种常用于评估广泛性焦虑障碍的工具。该量表由七个问题组成，用于评估受访者在过去两周内的焦虑症状频率和严重程度。通过计分的方式，可以快速了解一个人是否存在焦虑症状及其严重程度。
answerTips: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?

questions.content: Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge
Not being able to or control worrying
Worrying about too much of different things
Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
